title: Non-Abelian (2,0)-Super-Yang-Mills Coupled to Nonlinear Sigma-Models
abstract: Following a previous work on Abelian (2,0)-gauge theories, one reassesses here the task of coupling (2,0) relaxed Yang-Mills super-potentials to a (2,0)-nonlinear Sigma-model, by gauging the isotropy or the isometry group of the latter. One pays special attention to the extra "chiral-like" component-field gauge potential that comes out from the relaxation of constraints.
